name: Beautiful user interface
description: A fast and modern user interface your users will love. Based on Twitter's Bootstrap Design trend.

name: Collaboration & Alerts
description: Follow what interests you, get automatic alerts and collaborate on documents easily.

name: Easy setup
description: Simplified initial setup with a configuration progress bar (example: set your initial balances from one screen).

name: Reduce data entry
description: No need to create invoices manually, print and send them, register bank statements, follow-up payments... Automate more, save time.

name: Pay Multiple Invoices
description: Ability to reconcile a payment with several invoices using a button on the payment form.

name: Mobile
description: Get an instant access to all accounting features, wherever you are, on tablets or smart phones.

name: Clean customer invoices
description: Olam invoices are easy to create, beautiful and full featured. (payment terms, multiple taxes, discounts, price lists)

name: Draft invoice propositions
description: Draft invoices are created automatically by Olam based on sales order, timesheets or delivery orders.

name: Advanced Payment terms
description: Support multiple payments for one invoice, cash discounts, advance invoice and partial reconciliations.

name: On-the-fly payment reconciliation
description: When creating an invoice, Olam suggests outstanding payments automatically so that you don't have to reconcile it later.

name: Credit Card/Mobile Money Payments
description: Get paid quickly by supporting online payment with credit cards. We support main payment gateways like Paypal, M-Pesa, etc.

name: Aged receivable balance
description: The receivable report gives you a clear overview of overdue payments and treasury forecast.

name: Customer Portal
description: Your customer can track their order status, invoices, and payments through their portal.

name: Advanced customer statements
description: Get clear reports on customer statements and navigate easily through the documents to understand every customer use case.

name: QR Codes
description: Your customers can scan a QR code with their banking app to pay. The QR code is on PDF invoices and shows up in the payment screen of quotations and invoices.

name: Control supplier bills
description: Compare the information appearing on the Purchase Order, the Vendor Bill, and the Receipt to make sure you pay the correct bill

name: Employee expenses
description: Track employee expenses, from the recording to the validation and reimbursement.

name: Forecast expenses
description: Get a clear forecast of your future bills to pay.

name: Print checks
description: Get a proposition of supplier bills to pay and print checks in batch in just a few clicks.

name: Deposit ticket
description: Keep track of deposit tickets in just a few clicks to ease the bank reconciliation process.

name: Organize payment orders
description: Support your own payment flows with optional validation steps.

name: Manage cash registers
description: Easily track every cash transaction with opening and closing.

name: Import Statements
description: Use CSV files to import statements easily.

name: Smart Reconciliation Tool
description: Get reconciliation propositions automatically, register extra journal items on the fly, search efficiently. Interface for manual reconciliations, for both open and paid invoices. Learning of account numbers based on first manual reconciliation. Olam matches 95% of invoices & payments automatically and the smart matching tool allows to do the remaining 5% super fast.

name: Easy outstanding payments
description: Get partial and full reconciliation proposition directly from the invoice or the bank statement.

name: Online Payments
description: Confirmed online transactions create a payment for easy reconciliation. They also show up as notifications in the document’s chatter for easier follow-up.

name: Access Control Lists
description: Access rights are super flexible. Default configurations are already setup for accountants and advisers.

name: Multi-currency support
description: Get your currencies rate updated automatically every day.

name: Multi companies
description: Get all your subsidiaries integrated in the same system with consolidation reports in real time. Automate business flows with inter-company rules.

name: Multiple users
description: Define as many users as you want with different access rights.

name: Multi Journals
description: Organize your document into several journals (by departments, by type of activity) to split roles across several users.

name: Business Intelligence reports
description: Use Olam pivot table to navigate through the information: consolidations, drill-up/down, group data, filters, etc. Multiple standard reports are available - Profit & Loss, cash flow statements, cash reports, executive summary and aged payable/receivables, etc. Get standard reports and chart of accounts available for 80+ countries. Export to Excel and pdf.

name: Customizable dashboards
description: Create your own dashboard by assembling custom reports. Generate reports for any time period, comparing time period. Get dynamic calculation of certain fields e.g. YTD earning. Share filters and dashboard across teams.

name: Annotate any report
description: All reports are full dynamic allowing you to navigate easily. Create multiple annotations. Annotate reports to add your notes for the managers inline.

name: Customizable KPI's
description: Define your own KPIs based on formulas: gross margin, customer acquisition costs, growth rate by products.

name: Perpetual fiscal year closing
description: No need to report balance sheet accounts from one year to another. Automatic calculation of P&L based on chosen dates, only need to write the handling of earnings for closure. Choose lock entry dates for non advisers and all users.

name: Profit & Loss
description: Navigate easily through the flow of information from the Profit & Loss report.

name: Advanced Payment terms
description: Support multiple payments for one invoice, cash discounts, advance invoice and partial reconciliations.

name: Cash flow statement
description: Get a cash flow statement in real time with lots of options in the filters.

name: General ledger
description: Search and filter in the general ledger easily and zoom into documents in just a click.

name: Advanced Taxes Management
description: Olam's tax engine support a wide range of tax computations: price included / excluded, percentage, grid, tax on taxes, partial exemptions, etc.

name: Consolidated Journal Report
description: The consolidated journal displays what happened in each journal organized month by month for readability.

name: Balance Sheet
description: Get your current year earnings automatically reported to your balance sheet to report at any time without having to close/open fiscal years.

name: Tax reports
description: Get your tax reports in accrual or cash based, formatted according to the right country.

name: Tax Audit Report
description: The tax audit report allows you to check how the tax report is computed for audit purposes. In the tax report, select a line and click on the 'audit' button to audit the journal items (base and tax in the same report).

name: Consolidation
description: Combine financial information from multiple companies to generate a consolidated set of statements.  Leverage closing, historic, or average exchange rates and add multiple adjustment columns (no GL impact). Use data from other financial systems and adjust for partial control or ownership of one or more companies.

name: Hierarchies of cost accounts
description: Structure automatically your analytic accounts based on projects, contracts, departments, etc.

name: Fully integrated
description: Get analytic entries automatically produced based on timesheets, supplier bills, work orders, etc.

name: Analytic distribution
description: Distribute one accounting entry into multiple analytic accounts by using analytics tags and flexible distribution.

name: Multiple-plans
description: Manage multiple analytic plans with default values and assignations ratios between cost accounts or projects.

name: Analytic report
description: Get clear reports on your analytic accounts with hierarchy and subtotals.

name: Automatic Invoicing
description: Manage subscription and recurring revenues easily with contracts. Automate recurring invoices, payments and renewal alerts.

name: Renewal alerts
description: Your salesperson get automated alerts when contracts have to be renewed.

name: Customer portal
description: Your customers can change their plans, order upgrades or downgrades / unsubscribe through the customer portal. (Based on your configuration)

name: Recurring revenues & extra
description: Manage multiple subscription plans, templates and extra fees.

name: Assets Management
description: Track assets, depreciation boards and generate amortization entries automatically. Manage all events on your assets in just a few clicks.

name: Revenue Recognition
description: Manage multi-year contracts, automate deferred revenues entries and get clear dashboards on your recurring revenues.

name: Budgets
description: Track your budget and compare actual performance with different budget. Manage budget on your financial accounting or analytic accounts.

name: Web-service API
description: Connect third party applications with the Olam web service API. We support all languages: python, PHP, java, c#, ruby, ...

name: Sales
description: Get your customer invoices created automatically from your sales order, tasks or delivery orders.

name: Inventory
description: Work in periodic or perpetal inventory valuations. Get your accounting entries created automatically in standard price, average price of FIFO.

name: Purchase
description: Control supplier bills is just a few clicks. No need to record everything, they are proposed by Olam based on purchase orders or incoming shipments.

name: E-commerce
description: Get all your ecommerce transactions reported automatically in your accounts: sales, payments, refunds, shipping, etc.

name: Customer Portal
description: Your customers get an access to their portal where they can download invoices, check order status, track payments, etc.

name: Expense request
description: Easily submit expense requests: from your laptop, pad, or mobile phone. Or simply send the picture of the receipt to a configurable email alias.

name: Ask questions and give answers
description: Allow employees to record expenses for their professional spendings with a clear overview of all the spendings for a defined period, for events, travels, etc.

name: Add attachments
description: Easily add attachments to expense records to provide reviewers with proof of spendings such as tickets, bills, etc.

name: Expense reports
description: Group similar expenses in an expense report and speed up the approval process by approving all the expenses in one click.

name: Add comments
description: Write notes to expense records to add information for reviewers.

name: Submit to Managers
description: Submit drafts of expenses to managers to request for an approval.

name: Check status
description: Have a clear overview of all expenses'statuses at once as well as separately.

name: Review expense records
description: Review employee’s notes to complete, validate or refuse them. Add a comment when refusing to give employees an explanation.

name: Compare expense and receipts
description: Olam displays a preview of the receipt next to the expense request in order to facilitate the expenses approval processes.

name: Accounting integration
description: Once approved, journal entries for the expense will be posted and reconciled.

name: Manage per team
description: Follow expenses for a whole team.

name: Reinvoice your expenses
description: Easily invoice your expenses to a customer.
